pageTitle: Volunteers Needed For First Night Pittsburgh « CBS Pittsburgh
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4168=PITTSBURGH (KDKA) — Want to be a part of one of the city’s biggest New Year’s celebrations and ring in 2011 by giving back to the community? First Night Pittsburgh is looking for volunteers for its annual family-friendly party!}

textBeforeTable: TV Schedule //]]> document.write(' If you’re interested in volunteering, visit FirstNightPgh.org for details! Click here to sign up online now! Organizers are looking for volunteers of all ages and abilities (but those under 18 will need to bring an adult along)!
